website_summaries.verdict: While Nendoroids are fairly expensive figures, these compact and adorable figures are bursting with personality, and posing them is a treat.
pros: Extremely articulated and easy to place in cool action poses
cons: Nendoroids are often on the pricy side

customer_reviews.title: Naruto nendoroid
customer_reviews.text: I held off on getting this nendoroid for awhile now because I thought it looked kinda lame (even though I’m a huuugeee naruto fan) I did finally decide to get it and WOAH was I pleasantly surprised at how much I liked it ! I think one thing that helped was the customization of the nendoroid and I always enjoy the little backdrops. Thumbs up and would reccomend to any naruto fans or collectors on the fence about it :)
customer_reviews.author: nathan j humlicek

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described, all the pieces came in tact, etc. The quality seems to be pretty good. The only thing that's weird is that the pictures on the box show Naruto "holding" the rasenshuriken with a straight arm and his palm open, but that arm isn't included in the set. There's multiple photos of him posing with this straightened arm and open hand. There IS one arm included that has an open hand, but the elbow is bent, so you can't really acheive the rasenshuriken pose. Just an observation
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Levin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much! I'm always hesitant to buy figures that haven't been reviewed but I took my chances. I can say this is a genuine figure. The box looks so neat and the inside is very nice. The figure itself is amazing. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, different poses
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Nendroid figure, and it will definitely not be my last. Great quality, different poses. Much better than those funko pop figures. A definite buy for Naruto fans.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Love it! if you are a Naruto fan
customer_reviews.text: Love it! if you are a Naruto fan, it's a must have :D great service, delivered before estimated time and they even saved me some dollars :D
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: SO awesome
customer_reviews.text: There is literally nothing wrong with this little guy. Perfect in his cute fierceness! Would highly recommend to any Naruto fan!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful nendroid
customer_reviews.text: First of all and most importent its NOT a bootleg other than that quick delivery box in perfect condition and all parts are in place.the naruto nendroid is a beautiful nendroid a lot of parts included and an option for a lot of poses if you have the money a must buy for naruto or figure lovers alike.

product_meta.title: Good Smile Naruto Shippuden Naruto Uzumaki Nendoroid Action Figure
product_meta.description: From good Smile. From the popular anime series Naruto Shippuden comes a Nendoroid of the main character, Naruto Uzumaki! The confident expression of the grown-up Naruto has been faithfully captured in cute Nendoroid size! Translucent effect parts for both the Rasengan and rasenshuriken are included to pose Naruto, as well as a special stand which allows it to be displayed floating high up in the air so you can recreate two of his most memorable Ninjutsu techniques! Naruto's hand seals have been shrunk down into Nendoroid size, and the wrist parts are interchangeable so you can make use of other hand parts to recreate different hand seals! In addition, a special illustrated sheet of the tailed beast "Kurama" Is included to display Naruto interacting with the powerful nine-tails!
feature_bullets: Includes effect parts for Rasengan and rashenshuriken
Pose Naruto making two of his most memorable ninjutsu techniques
Special illustrated sheet of the tailed beast Kurama

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars78 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
